FuncDef: The display stp vlan bridge command displays details about the spanning tree of a bridge. The display stp vlan bridge command displays details about the spanning tree of a bridge.
CLIs: display stp vlan [ <vlan-id> ] bridge { local | root }

ParaDef.Info:
Displays details about the spanning tree of a bridge in a specified VLAN.
If vlan vlan-id is not specified, details about the spanning trees of bridges in all VLANs are displayed.
For the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ:The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4094.
For the CE6885-LL (low latency mode):The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 1023.

Displays details about the spanning tree of the local bridge.
-

Displays details about the spanning tree of the root bridge.
-
